mapper.select: SELECT st.*, sn.sellnow_num AS sellNowDto_sellnow_num, sb.sell_num AS sellBidDto_sell_num, i.item_num AS itemDto_item_num FROM sell_total st LEFT JOIN sell_now sn ON st.sellnow_num = sn.sellnow_num LEFT JOIN sell_bid sb ON st.sell_num = sb.sell_num LEFT JOIN item i ON sb.item_num = i.item_num WHERE st.user_num = #{user_num} order by selltotal_num desc
